    What Is Ceramic Coating?

    Nano-Ceramic Paint Protection

    Ceramic coating is a liquid polymer made of silicon dioxide (SiO₂) that chemically bonds to your vehicle's factory paint, creating a permanent or semi-permanent layer of protection. Unlike traditional wax or sealant that sits on top of the paint and washes away within weeks, ceramic coating becomes part of the surface — forming an ultra-hard, glass-like shell rated at 9H hardness.

    At Bespoke Auto Design in Miami, we exclusively install XPEL Fusion Plus™ — the professional-grade ceramic coating system from XPEL, the same brand trusted for our paint protection film installations. Fusion Plus is not available in consumer-grade products and contains higher concentrations of SiO₂ and TiO₂ (titanium dioxide) for superior UV protection, chemical resistance, and longevity — critical advantages in South Florida's relentless sun and salt-air environment.

    The result is a vehicle that repels water, resists contamination, and maintains an intense, liquid-like gloss that turns heads on Ocean Drive, Brickell, and everywhere in between. XPEL Fusion Plus doesn't just protect your paint — it transforms the way your vehicle looks and feels.

    Why Ceramic Coating?

    Benefits of Ceramic Coating in Miami

    South Florida's harsh climate demands more than wax. Here's why ceramic coating is the smartest investment for your vehicle's finish.

    UV & Oxidation Defense

    Miami's UV index regularly exceeds 11 — extreme by global standards. Ceramic coating blocks UV rays that cause paint oxidation, fading, and clear coat degradation, keeping your color vibrant for years.

    Extreme Hydrophobic Effect

    Water beads and sheets off the surface instantly, carrying dirt and contaminants with it. Rain becomes a self-cleaning event, and water spots are virtually eliminated — a game-changer in Miami's daily afternoon showers.

    Mirror-Like Gloss

    Ceramic coating enhances your paint's depth and clarity to levels that wax simply cannot achieve. The nano-ceramic layer refracts light for a deep, wet, glass-like shine that lasts years, not weeks.

    Chemical Resistance

    Bird droppings, tree sap, bug splatter, acid rain, and salt spray are relentless in Miami. Ceramic coating's chemical-resistant surface prevents these contaminants from etching into your paint.

    9H Hardness Rating

    Professional ceramic coatings achieve a 9H pencil hardness rating — the highest on the scale. This hard, sacrificial layer resists light marring, wash-induced swirl marks, and everyday surface contact.

    Resale Value Preservation

    A ceramic-coated vehicle maintains showroom-quality paint condition for years. When it's time to sell or trade in, your vehicle's pristine exterior commands a premium in the competitive South Florida market.

    Comparison

    Ceramic Coating vs. Wax vs. Sealant

    Not all paint protection is equal. See how ceramic coating stacks up against traditional options.

    FeatureWaxPaint SealantCeramic Coating
    Durability2–4 weeks3–6 months2–7+ years
    UV ProtectionMinimalModerateMaximum
    Hydrophobic EffectLowModerateExtreme
    Chemical ResistanceNoneLowHigh
    Scratch ResistanceNoneNone9H Hardness
    Gloss LevelGoodGoodMirror-Like
    MaintenanceReapply monthlyReapply quarterlyWash & enjoy
    Why XPEL Fusion Plus?

    The XPEL Fusion Plus™ Advantage

    XPEL Fusion Plus™ is a professional-only ceramic coating system designed to complement XPEL's paint protection film lineup. As a certified XPEL installer in Miami, Bespoke Auto Design applies Fusion Plus using XPEL's proprietary process — ensuring maximum bonding, durability, and performance in South Florida's demanding climate.

    Unlike generic ceramic coatings available online, XPEL Fusion Plus is formulated with a higher SiO₂ concentration and advanced UV inhibitors that are purpose-built for high-UV, high-humidity environments like Miami. The result is a coating that lasts longer, shines deeper, and protects harder than anything you can buy off a shelf.

    Professional-only formula — not available retail
    Pairs seamlessly with XPEL Ultimate Plus PPF
    Advanced UV inhibitors for Miami's extreme sun
    Extreme hydrophobic surface — water contact angle 115°+
    Chemical resistant against bird droppings, sap & salt
    Backed by XPEL's manufacturer warranty
    Can be applied to paint, PPF, wheels, glass & trim
    Installed by certified XPEL technicians only
    Our Process

    How We Apply Ceramic Coating

    A meticulous, multi-day process in our climate-controlled Miami facility. No shortcuts, no compromises.

    01

    Inspection

    Detailed assessment of paint condition, defects, and prior coatings under controlled lighting.

    02

    Decontamination

    Chemical decontamination, clay bar treatment, and iron fallout removal to strip the surface clean.

    03

    Paint Correction

    Multi-stage machine polishing to remove swirl marks, scratches, and oxidation — restoring factory clarity.

    04

    Coating Application

    Professional-grade ceramic coating applied panel-by-panel in controlled temperature and humidity.

    05

    Curing & Inspection

    Infrared curing followed by multi-point quality inspection under specialized lighting.

    Ultimate Protection Stack

    PPF + Ceramic Coating

    For clients who want the absolute best protection available, we recommend combining paint protection film (PPF) on high-impact zones with ceramic coating over the entire vehicle — including on top of the PPF itself.

    This combination delivers the physical impact resistance of PPF (rock chips, scratches, road debris) together with the chemical resistance, hydrophobic performance, and enhanced gloss of ceramic coating. The result is a vehicle that is virtually immune to Miami's environmental onslaught.

    PPF absorbs physical impacts; ceramic repels chemicals
    Ceramic over PPF enhances hydrophobic performance
    Combined UV protection from both layers
    Easier maintenance — contaminants slide off both surfaces
    Maximum resale value preservation
    The choice of exotic and luxury car owners worldwide
